com.gwtplatform.mvp.client
Interface HasUiHandlers<C extends UiHandlers>

Type Parameters:
C - Your UiHandlers interface type.
All Known Subinterfaces:
CarPresenter.MyView, CarsPresenter.MyView, EditManufacturerPresenter.MyView, EditRatingPresenter.MyView, HeaderPresenter.MyView, LoginPresenter.MyView, ManufacturerDetailPresenter.MyView, ManufacturerPresenter.MyView, NavigationTabPresenter.MyView, RatingDetailPresenter.MyView, RatingPresenter.MyView
All Known Implementing Classes:
CarMobileView, CarsMobileView, CarsView, CarView, EditManufacturerView, EditRatingView, HeaderMobileView, HeaderView, LoginMobileView, LoginView, ManufacturerDetailView, ManufacturerMobileView, ManufacturerView, NavigationTabView, PopupViewWithUiHandlers, RatingDetailView, RatingMobileView, RatingView, ViewWithUiHandlers
public interface HasUiHandlers<C extends UiHandlers>

Interface meant to be implemented by the View so that its controller can attach its UiHandlers. Important, when using this interface, you should always call setUiHandlers(UiHandlers) from your presenter constructor.

Author:
Christian Goudreau

Method Summary
 void setUiHandlers(C uiHandlers)
          Sets the UiHandlers subclass associated with this object.
 

Method Detail

setUiHandlers

void setUiHandlers(C uiHandlers)
Sets the UiHandlers subclass associated with this object.

Parameters:
uiHandlers - The UiHandlers subclass (of type C) to associate with this object.
